sizes_available: approx. 3.5 inches (9 cm) diameter x 2 inches (5 cm) tall
full_text: Get Cozy With This Adorable Pumpkin Knitting Pattern! Ready for a delightfully charming autumn knitting project? This free Munchkin Pumpkin pattern is the perfect companion for your warm cup of cocoa and a crisp, fall evening. Fall in love with this irresistibly cute knitted pumpkin. Whether you’re a beginner or an experienced knitter, you’ll find joy in bringing these adorable pumpkins to life. Customizable and Beginner-Friendly Feel like playing around with sizes and colors? Go ahead! This pattern is as flexible as it is fun. Create a tiny pumpkin for your mantel or a jumbo one for your porch. Choose autumnal oranges or go rogue with unexpected hues! Fast, Fun, and Oh-So Simple With no increasing or decreasing, this cute little pumpkin so so simple to make. You’ll have your own pumpkin patch growing in no time. A couple of hours, some yarn scraps, and voilà - your knitted pumpkin is ready to steal the show! SKILL LEVEL: Beginner SIZE: One Size FINISHED MEASUREMENTS (approx.): 2” (5 cm) high 3.5” (9 cm) diameter YARN: Worsted weight yarn: 45 yds/40 m MC Shown in Cascade 220 (Worsted weight: 100% Wool: 220 yds/200 m per 100g/3.5oz) 1 ball in Jack O’Lantern (7824) NEEDLES: 4 mm (US 6) needles for working in the round Or size needed to obtain gauge GAUGE: 5 sts x 7 rounds = 4 inches (10 cm) in stockinette stitch worked in the round NOTIONS: Stitch marker, tapestry needle, Polyfil or toy stuffing, cinnamon stick or twig, tape measure, scissors
name: Ravelry: Munchkin Pumpkin pattern by The Sleepy Stitch
